[00:00.00]X - Jonas Brothers (乔纳斯兄弟)/KAROL G
[00:02.07]Lyrics by：Shellback/Ryan Tedder/Nicholas Jonas/Carolina Giraldo/Ali Tamposi
[00:04.15]Composed by：Shellback/Ryan Tedder/Nicholas Jonas/Carolina Giraldo/Ali Tamposi
[00:06.23]Nick Jonas/Joe Jonas：
[00:07.93]Yeah
[00:08.46]Ooh-la-la by the pool we're singing "Bailando"
[00:12.40]Two ni-nights with a view yeah
[00:13.96]Keeping those blinds closed
[00:16.02]Yeah
[00:16.43]She said "I wanna find somebody by nightfall"
[00:20.59]Ooh-na-na could it be ya
[00:22.11]Baby I like you
[00:23.97]Joe Jonas：
[00:24.35]Oh watching her move I was lost in the rhythms
[00:28.50]And she pulled me close by the look in her eyes
[00:32.77]Don't know her name but I know that I need her
[00:36.87]She said "Boy you won't be lonely tonight"
[00:40.09]Joe Jonas/Nick Jonas：
[00:40.37]She said "Ooh-ooh-ooh"
[00:42.92]Kiss me like your ex is in the room
[00:46.95]Don't you be afraid of something new
[00:49.51]If you play it right you can be that someone
[00:52.59]Yeah that someone who
[00:55.27]Won't leave me lonely tonight
[00:59.40]Joe Jonas：
[01:00.73]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:02.78]Yeah yeah yeah
[01:04.92]Yeah

[01:09.27]Full moon night with the lights off
[01:10.92]Baby your eyes glow
[01:13.11]Yeah
[01:13.38]Don't know why but I feel like I'ma go psycho
[01:17.00]Psycho
[01:17.40]Ooh-la-la if it's cool
[01:18.77]Yeah baby I'd like to

[01:21.39]Oh watching her move I was lost in the rhythms
[01:25.55]And she pulled me close by the look in her eyes
[01:29.26]Yeah
[01:29.74]Don't know her name but I know that I need her
[01:33.77]She said "Boy you won't be lonely tonight"

[01:38.96]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[01:39.87]Kiss me like your ex is in the room
[01:42.32]Ooh-ooh-ooh
[01:43.92]Don't you be afraid of something new
[01:46.39]If you play it right you can be that someone
[01:49.38]Yeah that someone who
[01:51.79]Yeah
[01:51.99]Won't leave me lonely tonight
[01:54.33]KAROL G：
[01:54.80]Caliente te pongo caliente
[01:58.32]Ah
[01:58.46]No te de miedo vivir algo diferente
[02:02.61]Eh eh
[02:03.01]Las ganas no se equivocan-vocan eh
[02:05.31]Pon tu lengua en mi boca
[02:06.76]Boca eh
[02:07.42]Vive la vida loca loca loca ah
[02:10.46]Toda la noche bailando contigo
[02:14.44]Suave y salvaje como un animal
[02:18.34]Yo sé que te gusta pero esto es prohibido
[02:22.37]Yo me voy contigo dame la señal
